data.diff:
--- a/server/aido-agile-server/aido-agile-impl/src/main/resources/mybatis/CardMapper.xml
+++ b/server/aido-agile-server/aido-agile-impl/src/main/resources/mybatis/CardMapper.xml
@@ -384,14 +384,14 @@
             </foreach>
         </if>
         <if test="cardAS.version != null  and cardAS.version.queryType  == 2 ">
-            and c.version is null
+            and c.version is null or c.version = ''
         </if>
         <if test="cardAS.version != null  and cardAS.version.queryType  == 3 and  cardAS.version.data.size()>0">
             and ( c.version in
             <foreach collection="cardAS.version.data" open="(" close=")" separator="," item="iterm">
                 #{iterm}
             </foreach>
-            or c.version is null )
+            or c.version is null  or c.version = '')
         </if>
         <if test="cardAS.createTimeBegin != null and cardAS.createTimeEnd != null ">
             and c.create_time between #{cardAS.createTimeBegin} and #{cardAS.createTimeEnd}
@@ -564,14 +564,14 @@
             </foreach>
         </if>
         <if test="cardAS.version != null  and cardAS.version.queryType  == 2 ">
-            and c.version is null
+            and c.version is null    or c.version = ''
         </if>
         <if test="cardAS.version != null  and cardAS.version.queryType  == 3 and  cardAS.version.data.size()>0">
             and ( c.version in
             <foreach collection="cardAS.version.data" open="(" close=")" separator="," item="iterm">
                 #{iterm}
             </foreach>
-            or c.version is null )
+            or c.version is null    or c.version = '' )
         </if>
         <if test="cardAS.createTimeBegin != null and cardAS.createTimeEnd != null ">
             and c.create_time between #{cardAS.createTimeBegin} and #{cardAS.createTimeEnd}
@@ -747,14 +747,14 @@
             </foreach>
         </if>
         <if test="pageQuery.query.version != null  and pageQuery.query.version.queryType  == 2 ">
-            and c.version is null
+            and c.version is null   or c.version = ''
         </if>
         <if test="pageQuery.query.version != null  and pageQuery.query.version.queryType  == 3 and  pageQuery.query.version.data.size()>0">
             and ( c.version in
             <foreach collection="pageQuery.query.version.data" open="(" close=")" separator="," item="iterm">
                 #{iterm}
             </foreach>
-            or c.version is null )
+            or c.version is null   or c.version = '' )
         </if>
         <if test="pageQuery.query.createTimeBegin != null and pageQuery.query.createTimeEnd != null ">
             and c.create_time between #{pageQuery.query.createTimeBegin} and #{pageQuery.query.createTimeEnd}
